name: re-js
description: Abstract AST for JavaScript, written in ReasonML
author: Allen Nelson (ithinkican@gmail.com)

scripts.re:formatall: find src testlib __tests__ -name '*.re' | xargs npx bsrefmt --in-place
scripts.re:formatchanged: git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d HEAD -- '*.re' | xargs -I{} realpath --relative-to=. $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/'{}' | while read f; do npx bsrefmt --in-place "$f"; done
scripts.prepare:
echo $'#!/usr/bin/env bash
exec npx lint-staged' > .git/hooks/pre-commit && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit
